Welcome to the jMaki version .3 Demo
----------------------------


1. This application requires a web container that supports JSP 2.0 or JSF 1.1. 
This application has been tested against Glassfish which may be found at:

http://glassfish.dev.java.net


2.  Deploying

Copy the jmaki.war file to the autodeploy directory of your application server.
With a default install of Glassfish this glassfish/domains/domain1/autodeploy

3. Running the jMaki application

Open your browser to:

http://localhost:8080/jmaki/

4. Comments or feedback?

If you want to report a bug you will need to have a Java.net account and file it at:

https://ajax.dev.java.net/servlets/ProjectIssues

You may also email issues directly to: gmurray71@dev.java.net
